questionTitle: <u><font color='red'>There are</font></u> many different ways <u><font color='red'>of comparing</font></u> the economy of one nation with <u><font color='red'>those</font></u> of <u><font color='red'>another</font></u>.

<u><font color='red'>When</font></u> rhinos take mud baths, <u><font color='red'>the</font></u> mud <u><font color='red'>create</font></u> a barrier to <u><font color='red'>biting</font></u> insects.
